speaker: note in a bottle
dialog: crabs are dumbies and sometimes leave their belongings under shells :P

speaker: cat
dialog: Oh to be a carefree, little crub dancing and partying away on these sandy shores!

speaker: froggie
dialog: Huh, that was strangely poetic. Didn't think you'd have it in you.

speaker: cat
dialog: listen punk, once in a long while, my single brain cell somehow works!
